value.title: Wisconsin seeks $145,000 in fees for Trump's 'bad faith' election lawsuit
value.excerpt: Wisconsin's Democratic Governor Tony Evers has asked a federal judge to order Donald Trump to cover $145,000 in legal fees the state spent to defend against the former Republican president's unsuccessful effort to overturn its 2020 election results.

value.title: Suicides Fell by 2,600 in 2020, Despite Donald Trump's Lockdown Warnings
value.excerpt: Suicides dropped in 2020 amid the COVID-19 pandemic despite former President Donald Trump warning that lockdowns would inspire "suicides by the thousands" and cause deaths "in far greater numbers than the numbers that we're talking about with regard to the virus.

value.title: Former JPMorgan executive quits board of company that collected data for Trump 2020 campaign

value.title: Trump and his advisors are shrugging off DOJ's Capitol riot probe. But they see danger in the Georgia and New York investigations.

value.title: Donald Trump Jr., Kimberly Guilfoyle pay $9.7 million for Admirals Cove home in Jupiter
value.excerpt: After months of house hunting, Donald Trump Jr. and his girlfriend Kimberly Guilfoyle are Palm Beach County homeowners. On Wednesday, the high-profile couple paid $9.7 million for a waterfront home in Admirals Cove, an exclusive gated community in Jupiter.
